title: 95/505/EC: Commission Decision of 23 November 1995 repealing recommendation 80/823/EEC on the rational use of energy in industrial enterprises
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 23  November 1995 repealing recommendation 80/823/EEC on the rational use of energy in industrial  enterprises (95/505/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Sole Article
Recommendation 80/823/EEC is hereby repealed.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 23 November 1995.
For the Commission Christos PAPOUTSIS Member of the Commission
